Master's degree with major coursework in field of assignment and nine (9) years research experience in field of assignment, including at least two (2) years at level of Research Scientist or equivalent.Job DutiesPlans, organizes, coordinates, directs and personally participates in major medical or scientific research projects, including development and implementation of research protocols.
